GSD.product_version: versions from v3.6 to before v5.15.12
GSD.description:
inet: fully convert sk->sk_rx_dst to RCU rules

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.12 by commit 0249a4b8a554f2eb6a27b62516fa50168584faa4, it was introduced in version v3.6 by commit 41063e9dd11956f2d285e12e4342e1d232ba0ea2. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: inet: fully convert sk->sk_rx_dst to RCU rules
